subject: Missing Items From Order – Tracking #884181766070
description_text:
Hello,

I recently ordered a set of Plus X H3-P3 sim racing pedals along with 3 VAM
Pro Haptic Reactors. The order was scheduled to arrive together on
September 12th under FedEx tracking ID *884181766070*.

Only the boxes containing the pedals and baseplate were delivered. The box
with the haptic reactors never arrived. I’ve attached a screenshot of the
FEDEX delivery confirmation page, which confirms only the pedals/baseplate
boxes were delivered via courier photo.

Could you please assist in locating and sending the missing items?


Thank you for your help
-- 
Ethan Gorz
312 720 2113
ethangorz.com
